tool_description: Scores proposed meeting times based on individual participant preferences, work patterns, and historical scheduling data.

proposed_times.description: Array of proposed meeting times to score

preference_data.description: Historical preference data or explicit preferences for participants

weight_timezone_comfort.description: Weight for timezone comfort in scoring (0-1)

weight_work_pattern.description: Weight for work pattern alignment in scoring (0-1)

weight_historical_acceptance.description: Weight for historical acceptance rate in scoring (0-1)

error_messages: Invalid participant emails: One or more email addresses are not properly formatted.
Invalid proposed times: Each time must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp string.
Invalid weight values: All weight parameters must be between 0 and 1 and sum to 1.0.
Participant limit exceeded: Maximum 50 participants allowed.
Too many times to score: Maximum 20 proposed times allowed per request.
Preference data format error: Preference data must be properly formatted strings.
usage: Provide participant_emails and proposed_times arrays. Optionally include preference_data and adjust scoring weights. Returns preference scores for each participant-time combination.

preference_matrix.description: Matrix of preference scores for each participant and proposed time

aggregate_scores.description: Aggregate preference scores for each proposed time

scoring_summary.description: Summary of how scores were calculated
